contentList.content: Voidwoken now have a chance to appear when source skills are cast. Good luck!
<font color='#BBFF00' size='23'>*[1] beings gained a new level of power...*</font>
Today, we'll be playing Easy Mode.
Character is infused with a mysterious power, granting a variety of bonuses and extra skills.

Character has immunity to Stunned, Frozen, Knocked Down, Polymorphed, Petrified, Crippled for 1 turn after being affected by one of these statuses.
Can happen once every 3 turns.

[GLOBAL] Disable automatic world upgrading (upgrading everything in the level automatically outside of combat).

Note that this won't undo any current upgrades. (Currently Enabled)
Character has +2 Max AP, +2 Recovery AP, +30% Vitality, +30% Physical Armour, +30% Magic Armour, and doubles invested points in attributes and combat abilities.
A shadowy orb, filled with <font color='#9B30FF' size='16'>Treasure of the Shadow Realm</font>.

Disable Rewards - When upgraded enemies die, there's a chance for bonus loot, depending on their total number of "Challenge Points", which is determined by their upgrades. (Currently <font color='#8AFF49'>Enabled</font>)
Character is immune to enviromental effects.
Only the host can edit these settings.
Upgrade the world. Unleash the power!
Disable Commit Level Modifier to the World - *NOTE* This will not down-level enemies. Leveling only works one way! (Currently Enabled)
Disable Bonus Skill Upgrades. These give enemies new skills using the Script Extender. (Currently Enabled)

Commit Level Modifier to the World - This will level up every non-player character in the world to the desired level modifier, including neutral or allied characters (non-recruited Origin companions are ignored).
When <font color='#FF0000'>disabled</font> (Knocked Down, Stunned, etc), <font color='#FFAB00'>incoming damage is reduced by [ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_StunDefense_DamageReduction]%</font>.
Damaging <font color='#FE6E27'>fire spells</font> have a [ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_CursedFire_Chance]% chance to apply <font color='#B823CB'>Necrofire</font>.
Character is empowered with random upgrades.
Disable Class Upgrades - These are upgrades that grant enemies new skillsets and small ability bonuses, in class-like themes. (Currently Enabled)
Empowered by the Void, character has increased resistances, Accuracy, and Dodging. Protects against Diseased, Decaying, Petrified, Stunned.
Character gains <font color='#7d71d9'>Hasted</font> when standing on electric surfaces.
Character is immune to stun, and gains health when hit by <font color='#7d71d9'>Air Damage</font>.

A strange item retrieved from a Shadow Orb.
Cold to the touch, when this item is held, your grip on reality may begin to slip.
Enable Class Upgrades - These are upgrades that grant enemies new skillsets and small ability bonuses, in class-like themes. (Currently Disabled)
<font color='#4197E2'>[Key:Rain_Water_DisplayName]</font> creates a mild <font color='#7D71D9'>lightning storm</font> at the target location.

[ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_Madness_ChanceOnTurn]% chance to gain Madness when your turn ends.
Madness grants you bonuses and full control over your actions.
Character rolled a <font color='#FF0000'>Critical Failure (0)</font>, and now has to give bonus treasure if killed before this status expires. Hurry!
Summons your glorious chicken armada to the battlefield. Bwak!
Enable Summoner Upgrades - These grant enemies the power to summon creatures. (Currently Disabled)
Reflect 30% of melee damage as shadow damage
Disable Duplication Upgrades. This is a chance for clones of enemies to appear in battle. (Currently Enabled)
Character has a new bonus source skill.
[DEBUG] Enable Enemy Level Limit [Recommended] - Enemy levels above 35 may crash the game, so enable the limit to prevent leveling above 35. (Enemy Level Limit Currently Disabled)
Character has a set of new bonus skills.
Enable Enemy Level Scaling - Enemy will scale to the party's level + the current Level Modifier value. (Currently <font color='#FF4949'>Disabled</font>)
Character is the Overlord for an armada of chickens. Beware! Bwark!
Character has an elite set of new bonus skills.
Enable Bonus Upgrades. Includes upgrade types Infusion and Elite Infusion. (Currently Disabled)

Character is as quick as a demon.
With how fast this character can move, they're almost guaranteed to slip on ice.
Character will revive once when killed, coming back with 30% health.

At the start of an encounter, you gain one of two statuses: Cycle of Fire and Water or Cycle of Earth and Air. Cyle of Fire and Water increases Pyro and Hyro by 2. Cyle of Earth and Air increases Geo and Aero by 2. Statuses swap each turn.
Character gets 1 AP worth of free movement each turn.
Enable Boss Duplication - Bosses have a chance to be duplicated, like any other enemy. (Currently Disabled)

When an allied character dies, a Zombie Crawler is raised at their corpse, under their control. Zombie Crawler lasts 3 turns or until character is resurrected. Range 12m. Does not affect summoned creatures.
[GLOBAL] Enable Hard Mode - Enemies will get more upgrades, upgrades randomly get additional turns, and hidden hard mode features will be enabled. (Currently Disabled) (Default - Disabled)
Enable Talent Upgrades. Includes talent types Normal, Elite, and Weapon. (Currently Disabled)
Disable Bonus Upgrades. Includes upgrade types Infusion and Elite Infusion. (Currently Enabled)
Enable Immunity Upgrades. Includes limited duration elemental immunities like Fire Skin (2 turns), to Immune to Electrifying (3 turns). (Currently Disabled)
There's a reason no one plays this mode, and you're about to find out.
Voidwoken will no longer be lured into battle by source skills.
Character is persevering through sheer force of will.
Disable Boss Duplication - Bosses have a chance to be duplicated, like any other enemy. (Currently Enabled)
Character's attacks never miss but they cannot deal critical strikes.
Disable Immunity Upgrades. Includes limited duration elemental immunities like Fire Skin (2 turns), to Immune to Electrifying (3 turns). (Currently Enabled)
Character deals 50% extra damage with direct attacks against opponents that are Slowed, Crippled or Knocked Down.

Character is empowered by madness.
When their turn ends, otherwordly tentacles lash out upon, dealing [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_Madness_Damage] in a [ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_Madness_DamageRadius]m radius.
Reflect 20% of melee damage as shadow damage
Character has a chance to counter-attack when attacked within weapon range.
<font color='#00FFAA' size='16'>Will drop <textformat leftmargin='1' rightmargin='1'>[1]</textformat> on death.</font>
Character is immune to losing control, either through Fear, Charm, Madness, or being turned into a chicken.
Character has the ability for certain statuses to no longer be blocked by Magic or Physical Armour, and their duration is extended by one turn.
Disable Summoner Upgrades - These grant enemies the power to summon creatures. (Currently Enabled)
[DEBUG] Disable Enemy Level Limit - WARNING - Enemy levels above 35 may crash the game. Uncap at your own risk! (Level Limit Currently Enabled)
<font color='#9B30FF' size='16'>Grants Treasure of the Shadow Realm (<textformat leftmargin='1' rightmargin='1'>[1]</textformat>) on death.</font>

Damage taken increases Rage.
At max Rage, character gains +100% critical chance and immunity to disabling statuses.
Sleeping reduces Rage.
<font color='#33FF88' size='16'>Appraisers say this item used to be [1].</font>
Despite looking like a simple wooden mallet, this tool is more suited for smashing heads than fence posts.

Character is a Shadow of another character.
Grants no experience, but drops guaranteed loot.
<font color='#FF3737' size='23'>The EUO Singleplayer mod is active, yet the game is no longer singleplayer. Upgrade Info will not be synced for players.</font>

Every time character is hit with a melee attack while wielding a shield, they perform a counterattack.
Can happen only once per turn.
[GLOBAL] Disable source spells having a chance to lure Voidwoken into battle. (Currently Enabled)
Enemies will now roll for more upgrades, configurable in the global settings file. Good luck!
Despite looking like a large dowsing rod, this spear is more akin to a demon's carving fork.
Character has increased attack range of Bows and Crossbows by 2m.
Character is preparing to unleash their full power.
A razor-sharp cleaver capable of severing flesh from bone.
Character can backstab with non-dagger weapons.

Character has a chance to steal a consumable item on attack.
Can only happen once per turn.

[GLOBAL] Make enemies in levels automatically gain upgrades without being in combat. This may happen once per level. Non-hostile characters that become hostile will gain upgrades like normal.

*Note:* There may be a little bit of lag when upgrades are being applied initially, as this runs on every character in the level.
A sack of loot that was previously carried by a Treasure Goblin.
Character has an elite set of new bonus skills, and a mastery of sourcery.
Enable Duplication Upgrades. This is a chance for clones of enemies to appear in battle. (Currently Disabled)
<font color='#FF3333' size='23'>*Lost </font><font color='#C7A758' size='26'>[1]</font> <font color='#FF3333' size='23'>Gold!*</font>

Enable Rewards - When upgraded enemies die, there's a chance for bonus loot, depending on their total number of "Challenge Points", which is determined by their upgrades. (Currently <font color='#FF4949'>Disabled</font>)

Level Scaling Settings
Level Modifier: [LLENEMY_EnemyLeveling_Modifier_374d0f1d-bd61-4736-ad24-b1876a803c2f]
Scaled Enemy Level: [LLENEMY_EnemyLeveling_ExpectedLevel_4f2c6435-4ddc-4e2c-90d9-6506acb179ba]
<font color='#FF3737' size='18'>Immune to Movement-Based Damage Statuses</font>

When your turn ends, harmful damage-over-time statuses are <font color='#4197E2'>cleansed</font>, restoring <font color='#97FBFF'>[ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_ImmuneBoost_HealPercentage]% Vitality</font> per status.
[GLOBAL] Disable Hard Mode Extra Upgrade Rolling (Default - Enable) (Currently Enabled)
Enable Bonus Skill Upgrades. These give enemies new skills using the Script Extender. (Currently Disabled)
Enable Aura Upgrades. Includes auras such as Fire Brand Aura / Favourable Wind Aura, to limited duration elemental immunity auras. (Currently Disabled)
<font color='#33FF33' size='23'>*Stole </font><font color='#C7A758' size='26'>[1]</font> <font color='#33FF33' size='23'>Gold!*</font>
Enable Buff Upgrades. Includes upgrade types Weak, Normal, and Elite. (Currently Disabled)
Character has a new bonus skill.

The treasure goblin is fleeing!
Quickly, strike it down for LOOT!
<font color='#FF3737' size='26'>*Atusa's corpse oozes to life!*</font>
Disable Aura Upgrades. Includes auras such as Fire Brand Aura / Favourable Wind Aura, to limited duration elemental immunity auras. (Currently Enabled)

[GLOBAL] Enable source spells having a chance to lure Voidwoken into battle. (Currently Disabled)

Total source points used in the level will be tracked, and will gradually increase the chance and difficulty of voidwoken spawned. Total SP degrades every 5 minutes of real time (default).
Higher cost source skills have a higher chance to lure hostile voidwoken.
A gravedigger's shovel, this multi-purpose tool not only digs graves, but prepares their cargo for burial.
Character will revive once when killed, coming back with full health.
Character is healed when standing in blood.
A blade said to be sharp enough to reap souls. While not a practical weapon, this scythe is deadly in the right hands.

Character will discover hidden enemies while in combat.
Stealthed and Invisible enemies within 4m are revealed.
Becoming Drunk or disabled temporarily disables a Seeker's detection.
[GLOBAL] Enable Hard Mode Extra Upgrade Rolling (Default - Enabled) (Currently Disabled)
Character is obsessed with collecting grenades. One misstep and boom!
Character is immune to <font color='#FF0000'>Piercing Damage</font>.
Character cannot discover hidden enemies while disabled/drunk.
Character must wait before they can mug again.
Disable Talent Upgrades. Includes talent types Normal, Elite, and Weapon. (Currently Enabled)
Really make characters in the level gain upgrades? This cannot be undone!
Character has increased recovery and maximum Action Points when their health is below 50%.
Every time someone casts a Source spell in combat, character has a 20% chance of gaining a Source Point.
Disable Buff Upgrades. Includes upgrade types Weak, Normal, and Elite. (Currently Enabled)
Character is infused with tremendous power, granting a variety of bonuses and extra skills.
A corrupted distortion of a legendary sword, said to be able to slay Gods.
Melee attacks deal additional fire damage to burning targets, poison damage to poisoned targets and physical damage to bleeding targets.
Character will explode in a bloody cloud when killed, dealing 50% of their vitality as <font color='#9A00FF'>chaos damage</font> in a 3m radius to their enemies.
Character is growing even more powerful through a second round of upgrades!
Character has a [1] chance to counter-attack when attacked within weapon range.

Lock in the enemy scale? This will level up all non-player characters in the world to the the set level.
This cannot be undone.
Reflect 10% of melee damage as shadow damage
<font color='#BF5FFF' size='23'>*The otherwordly properties of this item prevent tampering.*</font>
